thread.title: Evacuated: Domestic terminal at Perth International Airport, Australia
thread.title_full: Evacuated: Domestic terminal at Perth International Airport, Australia

author: eTN Managing Editor
title: Evacuated: Domestic terminal at Perth International Airport, Australia
text:
Evacuated: Domestic terminal at Perth International Airport, Australia   
Aug 12, 2015 Banners   
The domestic terminal at Perth International Airport in Western Australia is current being evacuated. 
No exact information is available about what is causing this evacuation by local authorities. 
Passengers left the terminal in a rush even leaving full beer glasses behind. It appears everyone is safely outside the terminal awaiting further information. 
UPDATE: Perth Airport confirmed 2 terminals were temporarily evacuated; both terminals are now being reoccupied. Passengers left in a rush
